name: comLeve
description:
go to options for controls
play in fullscreen
there was supposed to be a local co-op but not enough time :(

Programmer: Patrick Pal-ing          SwipeMemories - itch.io

Artist: Hashiro#6384          https://www.artstation.com/danielrodrigues111111111111

when your wife gets grabbed by and transformed into a zombie, that's when the game matches the theme, because you have to figure out which of the zombies is "fake" (your wife)
if you accidentally killed the fake zombie, the game will be over and it'll show "she died". 

the goal of the game is to survive as long as possible
